member.name: T:Com.MarcusTS.SharedForms.Views.Controls.GenericViewButtonBase`1
member.summary: A button that takes a view to lay on top of it -- can be a label image, etc. NOTE that we need our own property change handling, since we have no view model. ISSUES: * On any setting or style change, we need to re-render !!! * Rendering needs to take the various appearance settings into account, especially radius, background color, etc. NEEDS: * Tap effects -- to grow or shake or vibrate on tap -- ? * Border Thickness * Border Color * Shadow Properties Implements the Implements the

member.name: F:Com.MarcusTS.SharedForms.Views.Controls.ShapeType.Box
member.summary: A 4-sides shape (square/rectangle) - can have rounded corners

member.name: F:Com.MarcusTS.SharedForms.Views.Controls.ShapeType.Circle
member.summary: A circle shape with a radius equals to the minimum value between height & width

member.name: F:Com.MarcusTS.SharedForms.Views.Controls.ShapeType.Star
member.summary: A star shape for which you can define the number of points and the radius ratio

member.name: F:Com.MarcusTS.SharedForms.Views.Controls.ShapeType.Triangle
member.summary: A triangle shape - the appearance depends on the height/width ratio

member.name: F:Com.MarcusTS.SharedForms.Views.Controls.ShapeType.Oval
member.summary: An oval shape - the appearance depends on the height/width ratio

member.name: F:Com.MarcusTS.SharedForms.Views.Controls.ShapeType.Diamond
member.summary: A diamond shape - 4-sides - the same you can find in a card deck - the appearance depends on the height/width ratio

member.name: F:Com.MarcusTS.SharedForms.Views.Controls.ShapeType.Heart
member.summary: A heart shape - the appearance depends on the minimum value between height & width

member.name: F:Com.MarcusTS.SharedForms.Views.Controls.ShapeType.ProgressCircle
member.summary: A progress circle shape acting like a progress bar with a radius equals to the minimum value between height & width

member.name: F:Com.MarcusTS.SharedForms.Views.Controls.ShapeType.Path
member.summary: A custom path shape defined by a list of points

member.name: T:Com.MarcusTS.SharedForms.Views.Controls.ShapeView
member.summary: This class allows you to draw different kind of shapes in your Xamarin.Forms PCL Implements the

member.name: P:Com.MarcusTS.SharedForms.Views.Controls.ShapeView.ShapeType
member.summary: Gets or sets the shape type - default value is ShapeType.Box

member.name: P:Com.MarcusTS.SharedForms.Views.Controls.ShapeView.Color
member.summary: Gets or sets the fill color - default value is Color.Default

member.name: P:Com.MarcusTS.SharedForms.Views.Controls.ShapeView.BorderColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the border color (ignored if fully transparent or BorderColor <= 0) - default value is Color.Black

member.name: P:Com.MarcusTS.SharedForms.Views.Controls.ShapeView.BorderWidth
member.summary: Gets or sets the border width (ignored if value is < 0 or BorderColor is fully transparent) - default value is 0

member.name: P:Com.MarcusTS.SharedForms.Views.Controls.ShapeView.CornerRadius
member.summary: Gets or sets the corner radius - (ignored if <=0) - default value is 0

member.name: P:Com.MarcusTS.SharedForms.Views.Controls.ShapeView.Points
member.summary: Gets or sets the points describing the path - (ignored if null or empty) - only for Path shape - default value is null

member.name: P:Com.MarcusTS.SharedForms.Views.Controls.ShapeView.RadiusRatio
member.summary: Gets or sets the ratio between inner radius and outer radius (outer = inner * RadiusRatio) - only for Star shape - default value is 0.5

member.name: P:Com.MarcusTS.SharedForms.Views.Controls.ShapeView.NumberOfPoints
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of points of a star - only for Star shape - default value is 5

member.name: P:Com.MarcusTS.SharedForms.Views.Controls.ShapeView.Progress
member.summary: Gets or sets the progress value - range from 0 to 100 - only for CircleProgress shape - default value is 0

member.name: P:Com.MarcusTS.SharedForms.Views.Controls.ShapeView.ProgressBorderWidth
member.summary: Gets or sets the progress border width - only for CircleProgress shape - default value is 3
member.value: The width of the progress border.

member.name: P:Com.MarcusTS.SharedForms.Views.Controls.ShapeView.ProgressBorderColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the progress border color (ignored if fully transparent or ProgressBorderWidth <= 0) - default value is Color.Black
member.value: The color of the progress border.
